attributes.description:
JUST ARRIVED - The ever popular 2021 Isuzu MU x 3.0 A/T has just arrived and will not stand long. This seven-seat 2021 Isuzu MU-X has been overhauled from the ground up. The new MU-X has gone upmarket in terms of features. It’s also stronger, safer, smarter and more capable, and with a class-leading 3.5-tonne towing capacity it’s well positioned to capitalise on surging interests in long trips. With push-button starting, keyless entry, and a 7.0-inch touch-screen with wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, bi-LED headlights, an electric park brake and 17-inch alloys with all-terrain tyres. The 2021 Isuzu MU-X has taken both safety and technology to the next level, and the adoption of the IDAS safety suite across the range will surely resonate with buyers.
The MU-X’s off-road electronics now include Rough Terrain Mode – an off-road traction mode – as well as hill descent control, while the top-spec LS-T receives tyre pressure monitoring.
Pairing a phone is simple, while the new multimedia unit combines smartphone mirroring, wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto connectivity with integrated satellite navigation, voice recognition, and regular plus digital radio.
Please note that the price does not include smash and grab and dealership fees.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.
